response.overview: Koza is a well-educated Turkish woman. She moves to Berlin to make a new start in her life, but her mind remains in Turkey and her mother. She constantly finds herself caught between two worlds. Just when she has a job opportunity, she experiences tension in an environment where she is dating her new boss, and this puts Koza in a difficult situation. Koza, who goes to her lover's bar to relieve her stress, has to face the life she thinks she has left behind.
response.title: Koza
